title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / Light Control
description: This Object is used to control a light source, such as a LED or other light.  It allows a light to be turned on or off and its dimmer setting to be control as a % between 0 and 100. An optional colour setting enables a string to be used to indicate the desired colour.. objectID:'3311'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3311'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'1.0'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Light Control`.

On/Off.description: Property. On/off control. Boolean value where True is On and False is Off.. resourceID:'5850'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Dimmer.description: Property. This resource represents a dimmer setting, which has an Integer value between 0 and 100 as a percentage.. resourceID:'5851'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'/100'.

On time.description: Property. The time in seconds that the device has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.. resourceID:'5852'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'s'.

Cumulative active power.description: Property. The cumulative active power since the last cumulative energy reset or device start.. resourceID:'5805'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'Wh'.

Power factor.description: Property. If applicable, the power factor of the current consumption.. resourceID:'5820'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Colour.description: Property. A string representing a value in some color space.. resourceID:'5706'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Sensor Units.description: Property. Measurement Units Definition.. resourceID:'5701'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Application Type.description: Property. The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.. resourceID:'5750'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.
